page.title: 09GAMES AT SCHOOL
page.content: We play most of the popular games at { {Mary Elton School in the West End of {Clevedon }but we play some games you may not find everwhere.One of these is {"Danish Long Ball".}It consists of 2 teams of 12-15.One team bats and thay line up one behind the other.The fielding team spreads over a 50-60 metre field.One bowler is chosen from the fielders.The bowler stands 5 metres away from the batter and bowls a tennis ball underarm.When the batter(who uses a bat like padder tennis racket)hits the ball he/she must run to the other end of the field without being hit by the ball.He/she can also be caught out.To score a run the batter has to run back down the field again without being hit but he need not come back immediately.The teams swop when five batters are out.
